solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String convertToTitle(int n) {--newline--        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();--newline----newline--        while(n>0){--newline--            n--;--newline--            result.insert(0, (char)('A' + n % 26));--newline--            n /= 26;--newline--        }--newline----newline--        return result.toString();--newline--    }--newline--}
